alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Maricopa; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 1:46AM MST until August 20 at 4:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR MARICOPA, NORTHEASTERN YUMA AND SOUTHEASTERN LA PAZ COUNTIES... At 146 AM MST, Gauge reports indicated flooding Columbus Wash. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of rural roads and normally dry washes. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sundad. Affected roadways include Agua Caliente Road. This includes the following streams and drainages... Farmers Canal, Deadman Wash, Loudermilk Wash, Columbus Wash, Red Raven Wash and Copper Wash. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
